name: Symbiosis
summary: Passes along the user's item to its partner immediately after the partner's item is consumed.
viability:
This is useless in Singles.
	
	In Doubles and Triples, however, this can be really good if the user consumes a Power Herb or uses a Berry. Florges will be immediately able to pass its item along, and with some team planning could provide an even more helpful item.
